mapper.sql: source_id, db_name, col_name, tbl_name, sub_task_id, col_type, col_length, col_precision, col_pos, is_null, col_notes, col_del_status, table_main_id, create_table_type
mapper.select: SELECT source_id sourceId, db_name dbName, tbl_name tblName, col_name colName, col_type colType, col_length colLength, col_precision colPrecision, col_pos colPos FROM t_table_info WHERE source_id = #{sourceConfigId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND db_name = #{sourceTableSchema,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND tbl_name = #{sourceTableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY col_pos ASC

SELECT t.source_id nodeCode, s.`name` nodeName, NULL parentCode FROM t_table_info t LEFT JOIN t_source_config s ON t.source_id = s.id GROUP BY t.source_id UNION ALL SELECT CONCAT(t.source_id,t.db_name) nodeCode, t.db_name nodeName, t.source_id parentCode FROM t_table_info t GROUP BY t.source_id, t.db_name UNION ALL SELECT CONCAT(t.source_id,t.db_name,t.tbl_name) nodeCode, t.tbl_name nodeName, CONCAT(t.source_id,t.db_name) parentCode FROM t_table_info t GROUP BY t.source_id, t.db_name, t.tbl_name

SELECT t.source_id sourceId, t.db_name dbName, t.tbl_name tblName, t.col_name colName, t.col_type colType, t.col_length colLength, t.col_precision colPrecision, t.is_null isNull, t.col_notes colNotes FROM t_table_info t WHERE CONCAT(t.source_id,t.db_name,t.tbl_name) = #{nodeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND t.col_del_status = 1 ORDER BY t.col_pos ASC

SELECT t.source_id, t.db_name, t.col_name, t.tbl_name, t.sub_task_id, t.col_type, t.col_length, t.col_precision, t.col_pos, t.is_null, t.col_notes, t.col_del_status, t.table_main_id, t.create_table_type FROM t_table_info t WHERE t.sub_task_id = #{subTaskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND t.source_id = #{sourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND t.db_name = #{db,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND t.tbl_name = #{tbl,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY t.col_pos ASC
